game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The Rhine Valley railway is one of the most important and busiest connections within Europe. Especially for freight traffic, this route has steadily increased in importance over the last twenty years. Experience the special features of the line in this scenario pack!
